p: Data for HCV genotypes were available for 864 of the study subjects, and of these, HCC developed in 73 (8.4%) patients. The 2-, 4-, and 6-year cumulative HCC development rates of patients with genotype 1 tended to be greater than those with other genotypes (6.1%, 7.4%, and 10.4% vs 3.2%, 8.1%, and 9.6%, respectively, P = 0.09) (Fig. 2C).
